org.ngi.nodes.geometry

Class Cylinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ngi.Element
      • org.ngi.Node
        • org.ngi.nodes.geometry.BaseMesh
          • org.ngi.nodes.geometry.Cylinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Cylinder
extends BaseMesh
    Creates a cylinder. Uses inputs for top radius, bottom radius, and height. Cones can be made. It also provides a boolean input to create the cylinder centered (centered z value only).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
